external_references.description: FireEye. (2015). APT28: A WINDOW INTO RUSSIA’S CYBER ESPIONAGE OPERATIONS?. Retrieved August 19, 2015.

objects.description: [APT28](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0007) used SMTP as a communication channel in various implants, initially using self-registered Google Mail accounts and later compromised email servers of its victims. Later implants such as [CHOPSTICK](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0023) use a blend of HTTP and other legitimate channels, depending on module configuration.
